;	Cheap and dirty map file
;
;	Structures: 	Metadata:
;	# Massive		
;	H Hard			#Crystals, #Ore
;	A Normal 1		#Crystals, #Ore
;	B Normal 2		#Crystals, #Ore
;	C Normal 3		#Crystals, #Ore
;	  Ground		#Workers, 1: Visible at start (and all connected)
;	. Rubble		Amount (0-5 with 5 the most), #Ore still inside
;	= Plate			#Workers, 1: Visible at start (and all connected)
;	+ Building		Number, Orientation
;	* Building Pl.	
;	O OreF			
;	Y CrystalF		
;	- Lava			
;	~ Water		
;	@ Artifact	
;
;   Keep all empty lines, this is what the loader uses as divider. 
;	(and line lengths over 1024 make us crash, try to avoid that)
;
;	TextureSet: 
img/map.png

;	Number of crystals to gather to complete the level (0 ignores it)
40

;	Number of ore to gather to complete the level (0 ignores it)
0

;	Number of artifacts to discover to complete the level (0 ignores it)
5

;	Number of buildings to own to complete level (0 ignores it)
0

;	The level introduction text: 
- Guys, you WONT BELIEVE what I DISCOVERED in our 
  base ...
- oh no whats the matter with him again? 
- A MYSTERIOUS. RED. CRATE. 
- Uh yeah, I see it. Pretty rusty ...
- And SCANS INDICATE, there are four MORE in this 
  cave!
- ookay ... I'll just not question how they got 
  here exactly - 
- Do you know what that MEANS? There might be a 
  TREASURE in every of those! We gonna be RICH!!!
- honestly, they look suspiciously like those 
  nuclear waste storages -
- I will NOT. LEAVE. these caves before we haven't 
  foud all four crates! 
- Hell, Jerry, we get it. It's okay, we'll find 
  you these crates. But we also have to extract 35 
  crystals, that was our mission here in the first 
  place! 

;	The level completion text:
- Hey guys, I think we made it! ... 
  I'm counting 35 beautiful crystals, and we also 
  found four of Jerry's crates! 
- Crates, CRATES! Guys, we're gonna be RICH! 
  Has somebody a crowbar or something? No, what?
  No, this is totally NOT nuclear waste! Ah I'll
  just use the drill instead. Aaaaand ...
- Oh my, I think I'll already return to the camp
  see you guys!
  
(Level comleted!)

;
;	Main Map:
;	
######################################################
#####BCC  BBBC#####AACCBBBA   ######BBB###############
###BBCCB   ABB###AABCCBBBAA    ######BBBB######   BB##
####BBB##  A######AABCCA###      ####BCCC####AA    BC#
#########HH#########AAA###AABB   BBBBAAA    BBAA @  C#
##BBA      #####   ######BBBB##AAAABBB   +  BBBAA   ##
##BBA  +   AAAB    ###BB     A##AA######     BB##  ###
#BBB##    AABBB   C###B === AAA######AAHAA   ####BB###
######   A#####BCCC##B  === AAAABBAACBCC########BB####
#####    A#####BCC######    ##ABAAACCCAAA#######BB####
####A    ######BBB#######AA######BBCCCCAAAA####AAAAA##
#####AAA#######BBA######BBB#######BBB ==== #####  BBB#
##CCBBA#######BA ====###    #######B  ==+=   ##     B#
#CCCBBC########@ ==+= AA     ######## ===~~~~~~~~#####
#CCBCCHH   ###BA ==== AA     A#####BBB  ~~~~~~~~~~~###
#####HH @  ####BA==== ###  AAABB#CCBBB###~~~~~~~~~~###
######     BBB####HH#########BBBBCCB##AA###~~~~~~~~###
##AA###   AAABBBC    ##########BCCC###AAAA###~~~~~~~##
#AAB########AAABB     AAA##BCC###CCC##AAA####~~~~~~~##
##BCC   CC####AAAA#   AABBBBB####   ###HH###~~~~~~~###
####     CCC#######BB####BBB####    ###BCCHH ====  ###
####CC    CC######CCB###CCCCC#   +  ###CCHH  =+==  ###
#####CC   C######BBC#####CCCC##      #BB###  ==== BB##
########HH#######  ..  ###CC##BBA    AAB####     ##BB#
#####BB    #####  ... ########BA##############AA##AAA#
####BBB == BB###A ..  ####ABB   ##############AA###AA#
####BB  ==  B####AA      AAB     AABBC    ###ABBB#####
######H      B####AA  ..  B####  AABBCC    ABBAA######
#####HHH#   === ###A  ... #####HH##BC## === ABB#######
###   H###  =+= #####     ###    ###### === ##BA   ###
## .. ##### === ########BB##     ~#####    ###A   --##
##@ .. AB#     ####CCC##HH#HC  ~~~~#####  ###   -----#
####   ACH    ==   CHHC    HH  ~~~~~########   -- @ -#
########CH    == ~~~~~~~~   ~~~~~~~~####BB  + --   -##
############   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~########BB   -----###
######################################################

;	To more comfortably change the meta values of a map, 
;	you can load the level and press tab ingame for an editor.
;
;	Metadata 1 (#Crystals, Rubble amount, Buildung ID, #workers)
